questions.question: What is the propagation delay of a logic gate?
options: Time taken for the output to change after the input changes
Time taken for the input to stabilize
Time taken for the power supply to stabilize
questions.answer: Time taken for the output to change after the input changes

questions.question: What is setup time in digital circuits?
options: Minimum time before the clock edge that data must be stable
Minimum time after the clock edge that data must be stable
Time taken for the clock signal to stabilize
questions.answer: Minimum time before the clock edge that data must be stable

questions.question: What is hold time in digital circuits?
options: Minimum time before the clock edge that data must be stable
Minimum time after the clock edge that data must be stable
Time taken for the clock signal to stabilize
questions.answer: Minimum time after the clock edge that data must be stable
